```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(rgdal)
require(leaflet)
require(leaflet.extras)
require(leaflet.providers)

require(dplyr)
require(readxl)
require(stringr)
```

# Loading in the data
```{r, controls}
library(leaflet)
base <-leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() 

base %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter)


```


``` {r, polygon}

n_tabs <- readOGR("Neighborhood Tabulation Areas.geojson")

leaflet(data = n_tabs) %>%
  setView(lat = 40.75, lng = -74, zoom = 11.3) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) 


```
